docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Beyond the walls of Judge Harvey R. Sorkow's courtroom here, experts in philosophy, law and psychiatry wrestle with social, cultural and ethical questions about surrogate parents that go far beyond the Baby M custody case.

headline.main: SEVEN-WEEK TRIAL TOUCHED MANY BASIC EMOTIONS

docs.snippet: LEAD: Beyond the walls of Judge Harvey R. Sorkow's courtroom here, experts in philosophy, law and psychiatry wrestle with social, cultural and ethical questions about surrogate parents that go far beyond the Baby M custody case.

byline.original: By ROBERT HANLEY, Special to the New York Times
